subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Seaver won games as a reliever and as a starter on the same day in 1984; one of the games, resumed after being suspended the previous night, was the longest in major league history.
snippet: Tom Seaver won games as a reliever and as a starter on the same day in 1984; one of the games, resumed after being suspended the previous night, was the longest in major league history.
